document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's legal marathon resumes this week with a tax fraud hearing on monday that will be followed two days later by the long-awaited "rubygate" trial.
document.title: berlusconi faces trial battles as ruby case looms
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's legal marathon resumes this week with a tax fraud hearing on monday that will be followed two days later by the long-awaited "rubygate" trial.
